alert.note: Alert for Gila Bend; Gila River Valley; Kofa; Southeast Yuma County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 7:21PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Yuma and Maricopa Counties through 800 PM MST... At 721 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Paloma, or 49 miles west of Gila Bend, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tacna, Sentinel, Paloma, Tyson, Dateland, Mohawk and Roll. This includes AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 40 and 88. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gila Bend; Gila River Valley; Kofa; Southeast Yuma County
